category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_supplier_prefix
preference.preference_description: This property must not contain the same value of the CATIA_oem_prefix and it should not contain the prefix, EBS, to avoid data loss. Modify the Supplier Prefix variable to indicate the prefix of the CATIA properties used to save supplier property values in CATIA, i.e., prefix_originalPropertyName.
